message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your share is worth less each round Alice, let's be realistic. 55-45 is my final offer.
I'll meet you halfway on your offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, it's your last chance for a decent deal.
